item.title: test
item.content: This is a test article.

item.title: test 2
item.content: This is another test article.

item.title: test 3
item.content: This is yet another news article.

item.title: Base Requirements Completed!
item.content: I just completed the base requirements for this project. I am the greatest!

item.title: A contact form is on the way!
item.content: I'm working on a contact form so visitors to this site can reach me. It should be up in about 30-40 minutes so stay tuned!

item.title: Contact form done!
item.content: The contact form is done! While I was at it I also added the ability to change the number of news items per page in the News section.

item.title: About page
item.content: I am currently designing the about page and creating content for it. It should be up shortly!

item.title: Advertising
item.content: Would you like to have your banner advertisement placed up on my site? You can reach me for advertising inquiries through the Contact page. I am looking forward to your business!

item.title: Server-side? What about client-side?
item.content: You can find all of my coursework for Client-Side Programming at: http://people.rit.edu/~saw7456/536/

item.title: Gone Fishing
item.content: I'm going to New York City for the weekend so after submitting this project I'm putting updates on hold until I get back. Please be patient with email responses!

item.title: About page cancelled
item.content: I decided to hold off on the about page since it was being finicky with text formatting. Don't worry, it'll get content in the future.

item.title: Submitting the project soon
item.content: I'm almost finished with the extras on this project so I'm submitting it soon. Wish me luck!

item.title: Commentacular!
item.content: I'm going back through all of my PHP code now to add comments and change the spacing to enhance readability. PHP: Now 50% more headache-free!

item.title: Appture is hiring!
item.content: Appture LLC, a Rochester-based tech startup, is looking for experienced web and mobile application developers! We are in the process of talking with RIT about giving co-op credit over the summer and have applied for a position at the RIT business incubator. Please leave me a message through the Contact page if you'd like more information.

item.title: Project Submitted!
item.content: I am submitting this project now. Hopefully I'll get an A!

item.title: test
item.content: testing RSS feed generation

item.title: RSS Feed Debugging Completed
item.content: I'm finished debugging my news RSS feed now. Parse away!

item.title: Article Permalinking
item.content: I'm working on setting up article permalinks now.

item.title: Permalinking done!
item.content: I'm finally done adding and testing permalinking. If it breaks for whatever reason I also made a permalink reset tool to remake the article pages and their permalinks.

item.title: Admin feed selection done and advertisements are on the way!
item.content: I'm done with the core requirements for the project now. I'm working on setting up an advertisements page now with the appropriate controls on the admin page. Weighted banners are on the agenda next after that.

item.title: Many many updates!
item.content: I'm done with setting up the advertisements page and its associated admin section now. Additionally, styling has been adjusted across multiple pages to make the site look better overall. I'm now working on a banner maintenance section on the admin page to allow admins to select what banners will be shown in the rotation.

item.title: Project 2 Done!
item.content: I'm finally done with project 2! Woohoo!
